text: Warren Hinckle (October 28, 1938, San Francisco - August 25, 2016, San Francisco) was an American journalist.The New York Times: Warren Hinckle, 77, Ramparts Editor Who Embraced Gonzo Journalism, Dies - The New York Times, accessdate: August 27, 2016 He became famous as the editor of Ramparts magazine in the 1960's. Hinckle was known for his no holds barred writing style (later called gonzo journalism), and as a supporter of the political left. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American journalists
title: Warren Hinckle
